titleStmt.title: Koncert for klarinet og orkester, opus 57

work.title: Koncert for klarinet og orkester, opus 57
Concerto for Clarinet and Orchestra, Opus 57

history.p: In 1926, shortly before he started composing his flute concerto (CNW 42), Nielsen mentioned the idea of writing one for clarinet and orchestra. It was not until January 1928, however, that he returned to the idea of a clarinet concerto. Nielsen worked on the composition from April until August 1928.
